data.message: If there was ever a movie that had no business walking on eggshells to keep a pg-13 rating it's this one. Fucking stupid. The talent from the director and actors is gonna be lost on me with the offscreen deaths, all them bullets and explosions with no actual violence, this could have been raw now it's the western hunger games.

replies.message: There were plenty of on screen desths in this movie.
Point is its obviously watered down for an easier rating
I pity people that need gore and violence to enjoy a good movie
It's still a viloent movie but when there's bullets and explosions everywhere people are gonna bleed and people are gonna cuss, it takes me out of the movie when its toned down.
